products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Cream Linen Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis blackout luxe cream linen roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 9.20 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their genesis luxe blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!
This neutral cream linen colour roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired.
 
 Product id: db-rbx1923 fabric colour: cream linen material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
